marketplaces.name: ai-agent-toolkit
marketplaces.description: A collection of powerful agent skills for task automation and orchestration
marketplaces.repo_description: A powerful agent skill for orchestrating complex, multi-step tasks through distributed sub-agent execution. This skill decomposes complex user requests into atomic tasks and manages parallel execution through virtual agents, with optional integration with Claude CLI for true distributed processing.

plugins.name: agent-skills
plugins.description: Collection of agent skills including distributed task orchestration and scheduled task management
